There is a lot of furniture that can be used to make visualisations more engaging or comfortable to use, this includes such things as legends and appropriate colour schemes. This tutorial provides links to a number of resources for building effective furniture.

# Glyphs and Iconography

Glyphs and icons provide a very useful way to convey meaning in visualisations quickly. Here are some resources:

- https://jpswalsh.github.io/academicons/
